title: BOOK
para: Search for and book a car on our site.

title: UPLOAD LICENSE
para: Upload your driverâ€™s license, and pay a small security deposit.

title: UNLOCK
para: We SMS your car details 20 minutes before pickup. Unlock it via the Zoomcar app.

title: ZOOM
para: Fill the start checklist in the Zoomcar app. Grab the keys from the glove-box and drive.

title: RETURN
para: Return the car to the same location and fill the end checklist to end your trip.
